attributes.action: Demand the immediate and unconditional release of the British National gailed in Sudan for allegedly insulting Islam
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I call for the immediate suspension of all aid to Sudan.  All diplomats should be recalled and all immigrants arriving in the UK from Sudan should be returned immediately.  If the Sudanese Government wants to act this in this way, then let this Government show it's true grit and terminate all relations with this despicable regime.

rejection.details: Mrs Gibbons has now been released.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
